## R Markdown

```{r}
library(cluster)
library(factoextra)
thyroid = read.csv("Thyroid_Diff.csv")
head(thyroid)
```
```{r}
thyroid$Gender = as.factor(heart$Gender)
thyroid$Smoking = as.factor(heart$Smoking)
thyroid$Hx.Smoking = as.factor(heart$Hx.Smoking)
thyroid$Hx.Radiothreapy = as.factor(heart$Hx.Radiothreapy)
thyroid$Thyroid.Function = as.factor(heart$Thyroid.Function)
thyroid$Physical.Examination = as.factor(heart$Physical.Examination)
thyroid$Adenopathy = as.factor(heart$Adenopathy)
thyroid$Pathology = as.factor(heart$Pathology)
thyroid$Focality = as.factor(heart$Focality)
thyroid$Risk = as.factor(heart$Risk)
thyroid$T = as.factor(heart$T)
thyroid$N = as.factor(heart$N)
thyroid$M = as.factor(heart$M)
thyroid$Stage = as.factor(heart$Stage)
thyroid$Response = as.factor(heart$Response)
```

```{r}
thyroid.new = thyroid[-17]
mydist = daisy(thyroid.new, metric='gower')
result = hclust(mydist, method='ward.D')
plot(result)
```


```{r}
summary(thyroid)
```

```{r}
cutting = cutree(result, k=2)
cutting
```

```{r}
fviz_dend(result, k=5, rect=TRUE)
```

```{r}
cont.table = table(thyroid$Recurred, cutting)
cont.table
```
